captions.text:
Three weeks we've been talking
about the Platt Amendment.

What areyou people,
on dope?

A piece oflegislation
was introduced into Congress
by SenatorJohn Platt.
ltwas passed in 1 906.

This amendment
to our Constitution...

has a profound impact
upon all ofour--

Where isIeffSpicoli?
l saw him earlier today
near the first floor bathrooms.

ls he still on campus?
Anyone?
Yes, Desmond?

l saw him
by the food machines.

- How long ago?
- Right before class.

Okay.
Bring him in.

What is this fascination
with truancy?

What is it
that gets insideyour heads?

There are some teachers
in this school who look
the otherway at truants.

lt's a little game
thatyou both play.

They pretend they don't seeyou.
You pretend you don't ditch.

Now, who pays
the price later?
You!

Wait a minute.
There's no birthday party
for me here!

[ Class Giggling ]
Ho/d, Mr. Hand.

What's the reason
foryour truancy?

Just couldn't make it
on time.

You mean, you couldn't
oryou wouldn't?

lt was like
a full crowd scene
at the food lines.
Food will be eaten on your time.

Why areyou continuously late
for this class, Mr. Spicoli?

Why do you shamelessly waste
my time like this?

l don't know.
[ Giggling ]

l like that.
[ Chuckles ]

''Mr. Hand, will l pass
this class?''

''Gee, Mr. Spicoli,
l don't know!''

That's nice.
l really like that.
You know what l'm gonna do?

l'm going to leave
yourwords on this board
for all my classes to enjoy.

Giving you full credit,
ofcourse, Mr. Spicoli!
All right.
[ School Bell Rings ]

title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High (4/10) Movie CLIP - I Don't Know (1982) HD

comments.text:
Love this Movie. I saw it at the 'Franklin Theatre" the weekend it came out 
in my town. I know I am going to get slammed for this but I think it's 
better than
"Animal House" (But that was a College movie) I still think "Animal House" 
is overrated.﻿
comments.author: Frank Daddario

comments.text:
I never really liked Ray Walston.  He's always playing bores, assholes, 
jerks, and grouchy old men.

P.S.  This isn't the real Bill Bixby talkin'.  LOL!﻿

comments.text:
WTF! The teacher is giving them all F's and then mocking them for not 
knowing the Platt Amendment. 
He then proceeds to incorrectly state that the Platt Amendment amended "Our 
Constitution". IT DID NOT!!!
 IT AMENDED THE CUBAN CONSTITUTION NOT THE US CONSTITUTION.﻿
comments.author: STDrepository

comments.text:
I used to have a teacher like that my senior year of high school. He would 
pass back our exams individually and make comments on how well you did, if 
you did well and if you did bad. His exams were really hard and I didn't do 
well and it was embarrassing when I didn't do well, which was often. One of 
the worst teachers I've ever had and I didn't like him at all!!﻿
comments.author: Ashley White

comments.text:
I grew up thinking Mr. Hand was a jerk but now watching this 20 years later 
I do not feel that way anymore. If we actually had more teachers with 
passion and great concern like this in our High School's the system 
wouldn't be so broke. Teachers that actually gave a damn about where a 
student was and reprimanding individuals for not doing better.﻿
comments.author: Johny Rome

comments.text:
"They pretend they don't see you. You pretend you don't ditch. Now who pays 
the price later?  You!"  It's right there in the script...in the movie.  Of 
course, it gets skipped over by people, but it's Mr. Hand's whole point and 
it's true.

comments.text:
Every single thing that Mr. Hand said about the Platt Amendment is wrong. 
It was a statute amending another pre-existing statute (not an amendment to 
the constitution), it was named after Orville Platt (not John Platt), and 
it was in 1901 (not 1906).
